short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to pop out videos from webpages. Adds a customizable button to each video of the webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to pop out videos from webpages. It Adds a customisable button to each video of the webpage. 

Comparison with other similar tools :

A. It will add the button exactly where the video is, and will be shown when you hover over the video. Unlike others you will not have to manually go to the extension icon and click to pop out the video.

B. Gives a lot of options to customise the button according to your needs. 

C. Works with all webpages... Youtube, Twitch, Google meet, amazon prime video, Netflix, etc...
